explains: adj. 无法形容的；不能以言语表达的；坏透了的

sentences.cn: 这种痛苦是无法形容的。

sentences.en: The judge described the offences as nauseating and unspeakable.
sentences.cn: 法官把这些罪行描述为“令人作呕、难以言表”。

sentences.en: He told the kaiser that a war between Britain and Germany would be an "unspeakable calamity".
sentences.cn: 他告诉恺撒，英国和德国之间的战争将会是一场“难以言状的灾难”。
